The Role of Cognitive Biases in Flat Earth Beliefs

Cognitive biases play a significant role in the persistence of flat Earth beliefs.

Proponents often rely on confirmation bias, where they selectively seek out

information that supports their views while ignoring contradictory evidence

(Confirmation Bias). Additionally, the availability heuristic can lead individuals

to overestimate the importance or likelihood of events based on how easily

examples come to mind (Availability Heuristic).
